casebody.data:
The GRANDE VILLAS AT THE PRESERVE CONDOMINIUM HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC.
v.
INDIAN BEACH ACQUISITION LLC and Thomas P. Ryan No. 442P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Benjamin L. Worley, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Indian Beach Acquisition LLC, et al. Jessica E. Bowers, Attorney at Law, Matthew C. Bouchard, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The Grande Villas At The Preserve Condominium Homeowners Association, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 18th of December 2018 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
